name: SayMore
author: Nick Holdren

sections.description: SayMore is a email opt-in plugin that adds users to an ExactTarget list using the web collect method once they comment on a post/page in your blog.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where do I find my ExactTarget list ID (LID)?

The ExactTarget list ID can be found under the list properties panel.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • This is the initial release of GetMore.

short_description: An opt-in plugin for collecting email addresses of those who comment on your blog.
description: SayMore is a email opt-in plugin that adds users to an ExactTarget list using the web collect method once they comment on a post/page in your blog.

upgrade_notice.1.0: This is the initial release of GetMore.
